content: Comprehensive testing initiative using MCP tools: (1) complete-test ran 5 iterations, found 6 issues, fixed 7, final score 53/100 (below quality gates) (2) language-server MCP requires TypeScript configuration - not pre-configured (3) Running native TypeScript diagnostics via npx tsc --noEmit to find type errors (4) Available MCPs: complete-test (testing/auto-fix), pagespeed (performance), language-server (needs config), memory-bank (project docs), seo-mcp, github, file-preview, image-downloader, cedarscript, screenshot, playwright (5) Next: Fix TS errors, run performance tests, generate report
